name: Oğulcan
info: I have been interested in Frontend Web Development since 2018. Of course, I started with HTML and CSS like everyone else.After various jobs, I decided to make Frontend Development my profession and i start learning JavaScript. I've been working with React since first quarter of 2022 and I have done many projects.Hope you enjoy the tour.

title: Movie Archive App
project_info: This is a movie archive app that allows you to search for movies by title and add your watched movies to your list.There is a small feature that recommends similar movies to selected movie.

title: Weather App
project_info: This is a weather app that use your location or allows you to search for weather by city name.There is a small feature that colorize the cards by weather condition.

title: Question Game App
project_info: Question game creation platform where you can create questions and answers and send them to your friends, make changes to the games you have created or to someone else (if they have not set a password). It is currently under development, since there is no database to store the games, it will be deleted when the page is refreshed, and you cannot distribute your game with the link for this reason.
